name: Senior Division - Herz Team N.E.S
description: The SFRPD Youth Flag Football League is a co-ed non-contact 5 x 5 league with an emphasis finesse and technique, with running plays, passing plays and route running. Players will have the opportunity to learn different positions and build the skills needed to be successful at each position. The league will service two age groups: The Future stars Division (8-10). And the Showcase division (11-13) both divisions will be a 5 on 5 passing only non-blocking league, all participants will play in a he

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
cost: This is a fee based service.
